    • Constructor Detail

      • KnowledgeBase

        public KnowledgeBase(boolean connect,
             boolean fallback)

    • Method Detail

      • setConnect

        public void setConnect(boolean value)
        Sets whether the knowledge base tries to connect to a KAPcom server running on the local machine and default port. If false, then the knowledge is initialized with off-line defaults.

      • getConnect

        public boolean getConnect()

      • setFallback

        public void setFallback(boolean value)
        If set to true, it is silently ignored if KAPcom is not available, and the off-line model is used instead.

      • getFallback

        public boolean getFallback()

      • setCulture

        public void setCulture(java.lang.String value)
        Sets the language for all knowledge management related functions. Use de-DE for German and en-US for English. The default is German.

      • getCulture

        public java.lang.String getCulture()

      • setOutgoingUpdateIntervalMillis

        public void setOutgoingUpdateIntervalMillis(int value)
        Sets the interval (in milliseconds) in which position (and other) is sent to KAPcom for use by other services. 0 to disable.

      • getOutgoingUpdateIntervalMillis

        public int getOutgoingUpdateIntervalMillis()

      • Initialize

        public void Initialize(SimulationBasics sim,
              java.lang.String host,
              int port)
        Initializes the knowledge store. This might establish a connection to KAPcom.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether KAPcom access is currently enabled. It does not test the actual connectivity.

      • getUser

        public UserKnowledge getUser()

      • User

        public static UserKnowledge User()

      • getVehicle

        public VehicleKnowledge getVehicle()

        public void sendSetProperty(java.lang.String path,
                   java.lang.String propertyName,
                   java.lang.String propertyValue,
                   java.lang.String propertyType)

      • run

        public void run()
        Sends information about the current vehicle status to KAPcom for use by other applications. This may be called many times a second (update rate is limited internally).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
